column5: Back out on the Grand today where Bern and I were fishing the other night, no hits after 10 minutes so my client and I headed off to another spot. We managed to find the fish and in a couple of hours landed 14 channel cats while losing only two.  It was a great day on the water with some nice cats ranging in weight from 5lbs to 21lbs.  Right now the Channel Cats are definately biting.            Thanks to the Guys that stopped by today... Nice Cats.  Great seeing some board members out there enjoying the weather lately.
Great stuff!  Why is Santa standing in the cooler???
Great pictures those are some big cats  Rob
It's confirmed....spring is here lol  Beautiful channels.  ...and kickin, santa is in the cooler cause had a good day fishing lol  -R-
Very nice! I gotta get down there soon.

Forsure now is the time to get into the 20lb plus fish ..sitting here now watching 2 kids out front  of the store of the bank catching cats pretty steady  ...you don't need a boat reach these hawgs ..
Great stuff, thought it would be too high and cold still!

Awesome! Keep up the reports Steve. I'll be down for a visit as soon as I can make it!  PS: Do you have those circle hooks in stock you had last year? Would like to get my grubby paws on some. My hooks are terrible, way too many lost fish.
Man, dem is some phat cats!!  Thanx for posting.  HD
